title: 11th July 1962: The world’s first satellite television broadcast took place using the recently-launched Telstar satellite
itunes:summary: Telstar's first broadcast involved  relaying an image of a flag outside its base station at Andover Earth Station to the Pleumeur-Bodou earth station in ...
